practice_content.instructions: Practice Spanish future tense with these exercises.

exercises.instructions: Conjugate these verbs in the future tense

prompts.subject: yo
prompts.explanation: Regular future: hablar + é = hablaré

prompts.subject: tú
prompts.explanation: Regular future: comer + ás = comerás

prompts.subject: él
prompts.explanation: Regular future: vivir + á = vivirá

prompts.subject: nosotros
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: tener → tendr- + emos = tendremos

prompts.subject: vosotros
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: poder → podr- + éis = podréis

prompts.subject: ellos
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: hacer → har- + án = harán

prompts.subject: yo
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: decir → dir- + é = diré

prompts.subject: ella
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: salir → saldr- + á = saldrá

prompts.subject: ustedes
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: venir → vendr- + án = vendrán

prompts.subject: tú
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: poner → pondr- + ás = pondrás

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'estudiar' for 'yo'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: estudiar + é = estudiaré

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'querer' for 'tú'?
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: querer → querr- + ás = querrás

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'saber' for 'él'?
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: saber → sabr- + á = sabrá

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'escribir' for 'nosotros'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: escribir + emos = escribiremos

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'haber' for 'ellos'?
prompts.explanation: Irregular future: haber → habr- + án = habrán

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'ir' for 'vosotros'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: ir + éis = iréis

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'ser' for 'yo'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: ser + é = seré

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'dar' for 'ella'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: dar + á = dará

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'ver' for 'ustedes'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: ver + án = verán

prompts.question: What is the future form of 'estar' for 'nosotros'?
prompts.explanation: Regular future: estar + emos = estaremos

quiz_content.instructions: Test your knowledge of Spanish future tense.

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'hablar' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: Regular future: infinitive + é = hablaré

questions.question_text: Which verb has an irregular future stem?
questions.explanation: Tener becomes 'tendr-' in future (tendré)

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'poder' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: poder → podr- + ás = podrás

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Mañana _____ (llover).'
questions.explanation: Regular future: llover + á = lloverá

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'hacer' for 'ellos'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: hacer → har- + án = harán

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'decir' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: decir → dir- + é = diré

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'salir' for 'nosotros'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: salir → saldr- + emos = saldremos

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Yo _____ (estudiar) más el próximo año.'
questions.explanation: Regular future: estudiar + é = estudiaré

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'venir' for 'ustedes'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: venir → vendr- + án = vendrán

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'poner' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: poner → pondr- + ás = pondrás

questions.question_text: Which verb keeps its infinitive form in future?
questions.explanation: Regular verbs like 'comer' keep infinitive + future endings

questions.question_text: Complete: '¿_____ (tener) tiempo mañana?'
questions.explanation: Irregular future: tener → tendr- + ás = tendrás

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'querer' for 'ella'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: querer → querr- + á = querrá

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Nosotros _____ (viajar) en verano.'
questions.explanation: Regular future: viajar + emos = viajaremos

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'saber' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: saber → sabr- + é = sabré

questions.question_text: Complete: 'La clase _____ (empezar) a las nueve.'
questions.explanation: Regular future: empezar + á = empezará

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'haber' for 'ellos'?
questions.explanation: Irregular future: haber → habr- + án = habrán

questions.question_text: Complete: '¿Qué _____ (hacer) este fin de semana?'
questions.explanation: Irregular future: hacer → har- + ás = harás

questions.question_text: What is the future form of 'ir' for 'vosotros'?
questions.explanation: Regular future: ir + éis = iréis

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Ellos _____ (llegar) tarde.'
questions.explanation: Regular future: llegar + án = llegarán
